meanings.sent1: The buckaroos rode their horses across the open plains.
meanings.sent2: The buckaroos herded the cattle on the ranch.
meanings.sent3: The buckaroos laughed and shared stories around the campfire.
meanings.sent4: The buckaroos were the heroes of the Wild West.
meanings.sent5: The buckaroos wore hats and boots as they worked on the farm.

meanings.sent1: She saved up all her buckaroos to buy a new bicycle.
meanings.sent2: He earned a lot of buckaroos from his summer job.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of shiny buckaroos.
meanings.sent4: In the game, players collect buckaroos to win prizes.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was overflowing with golden buckaroos.
